title: Add FO-07 discovery and affirmation prompts to seed.ts
description:
Add all FO-07 KV store prompts to the seed script, based heavily on FO-04's prompts.

Files to modify:
- `src/db/seed.ts` - Add FO-07 prompt entries

Prompts to add (based on FO-04 patterns):
1. `versions.fo-07-discovery._info.default` - Info metadata
2. `versions.fo-07-discovery._model_name.default` - Model config
3. `versions.fo-07-discovery._temperature.default` - Temperature config
4. `versions.fo-07-discovery.system.default` - Discovery system prompt (copy from FO-04)
5. `versions.fo-07-discovery.prompt.default` - Discovery prompt (copy from FO-04)
6. `versions.fo-07-affirmation._info.default` - Info metadata
7. `versions.fo-07-affirmation._model_name.default` - Model config
8. `versions.fo-07-affirmation._temperature.default` - Temperature config
9. `versions.fo-07-affirmation.system.default` - Affirmation system prompt (based on FO-04, but generate 20 at once)
10. `versions.fo-07-affirmation.prompt.default` - Affirmation prompt (modified for 20 affirmations, no feedback)
11. `versions.fo-07-summary.system.default` - Summary system prompt
12. `versions.fo-07-summary.prompt.default` - Combined journey + affirmation types summary

Key differences from FO-04:
- Affirmation prompt generates 20 (not 10) in a single call
- No prompt_with_feedback variant needed (no swipe feedback loop)
- New summary prompts for the review screen header

Reference FO-04 prompts in seed.ts (search for 'versions.fo-04') for format and content.

After modifying, run `npm run db:seed` to verify seed runs without errors.

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the seed command succeeds.
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed completes without errors
closed_reason: Added 15 FO-07 KV store prompts to seed.ts: discovery agent (5 entries - same as FO-04), affirmation agent (5 entries - modified for 20 at once, no feedback), summary agent (5 entries - new for review screen). Key changes: affirmation system prompt outputs 20 instead of 10, single prompt.default instead of prompt_initial/prompt_with_feedback, summary agent uses lower temperature (0.7) for consistency.
